properties.query:
//Author: Stephen Rowley
//Description: Looks for Intune enrollment activity that occurs outside of standard U.S. work hours, Monday - Friday, 8AM-5PM, Eastern Time.
//False Positives: None known
let suspectDay = dynamic (['6.00:00:00', '0.00:00:00']); //e.x 0.00:00:00 = Sunday 1.00:00:00 = Monday
let workdayStart = 13;
let workdayEnd = 25; //24hr time
let workdayOverflow = iff(workdayEnd >= 24, workdayEnd-24, 0);
let mainTimeFrame = 24h;
let identitylookupTimeFrame = 90d;
let main =
SigninLogs
| where TimeGenerated >=ago(mainTimeFrame)
| where AppDisplayName has "intune"
| extend Detail = todynamic(DeviceDetail)
| extend Day = tostring(dayofweek(TimeGenerated))
| extend Hour = hourofday(TimeGenerated)
| where (Day has_any(suspectDay)) or ((workdayOverflow < Hour and Hour < workdayStart) or (Hour > workdayEnd))
| mv-expand ConditionalAccessPolicies
| where ConditionalAccessPolicies['result'] == "failure" or ConditionalAccessPolicies['result'] == "success"
| extend ConditionalAccessPolicy = strcat(toupper(ConditionalAccessPolicies['result']), "----",  ConditionalAccessPolicies['displayName'])
| project
    Time = TimeGenerated,
    Day,
    Hour,
    OS = Detail['operatingSystem'],
    Operation = OperationName,
    UserId = UserPrincipalName,
    ConditionalAccessPolicy,
    Source = SourceSystem,
    LocationDetails,
    ResultSignature, 
    ResultDescription
;
let users = main
| summarize make_set(UserId);
main
| join kind=leftouter (IdentityInfo
| where TimeGenerated >=ago(identitylookupTimeFrame)
| where AccountUPN in (users)
| summarize max(TimeGenerated), make_set(AccountDisplayName), make_set(Department), make_set(JobTitle) by AccountUPN
| extend AccountDisplayName = set_AccountDisplayName[0], Department = set_Department[0], JobTitle = set_JobTitle[0]
| project-away set_AccountDisplayName, set_Department, set_JobTitle
)
on $left.UserId == $right.AccountUPN
| extend Department = iif(UserId contains "dod365.onmicrosoft", "Admin Account", iif(isempty(Department), "Not Listed", Department))
| extend JobTitle = iif(UserId contains "dod365.onmicrosoft", "Admin Account", iif(isempty(JobTitle), "Not Listed", JobTitle))
